rootCause: helm-oci-install forwarded key=value CLI arguments directly to _helm-oci-deploy, causing the chart argument to be constructed as chart=chart=oci://ghcr.io/democratizedspace/charts/dspace when users followed the documented invocation.
resolution: Normalized helm-oci arguments in _helm-oci-deploy so key=value inputs are stripped of duplicate prefixes before invoking helm, preserving the documented CLI interface and validating the generated command via just -n.
references: just helm-oci-install release=dspace namespace=dspace chart=oci://ghcr.io/democratizedspace/charts/dspace values=docs/examples/dspace.values.dev.yaml,docs/examples/dspace.values.staging.yaml version_file=docs/apps/dspace.version default_tag=v3-latest
